xwikidoc.name: FeaturesExtract
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Features

use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki

xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set ($discard=$xwiki.ssx.use('platform:Features.FeaturesExtract')) #set ($map = [ {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@edit-select-all.png', 'link' : '[[Page editing>>platform:Features.PageEditing]]', 'description' : 'Use simple [[wiki syntax>>platform:Main.XWikiSyntax]] to format text, create tables, create links, display images, etc. Alternatively use a powerful [[WYSIWYG editor>>platform:Features.WysiwygEditor]] to edit the content of documents.'}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@document-open.png', 'link' : '[[Version Control>>platform:Features.VersionControl]]', 'description' : 'Any change made in XWiki is saved under version control, meaning you can view any previous version of a page, compare different versions or rollback to any past version.'}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@edit-redo.png', 'link' : '[[Exports>>platform:Features.Exports]]', 'description' : 'Export wiki pages to PDF, ODT, RTF, XML or HTML.'}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@applications-internet.png', 'link' : '[[Spaces>>platform:Features.Spaces]]', 'description' : 'Organize your documents by grouping them together by domain.'}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@accessories-text-editor.png', 'link' : '[[Programming>>platform:Features.Programming]]', 'description' : "Use XWiki's programming API directly into your pages (Velocity or Groovy) to perform advanced formatting, layout or anything really."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@package-x-generic.png', 'link' : '[[Applications & Extensions>>platform:Features.Applications]]', 'description' : 'Create applications by grouping several pages together. Import and export Applications to/from your wiki.'}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@view-refresh.png', 'link' : '[[RESTful>>platform:Features.XWikiRESTfulAPI]] and [[XML/RPC>>platform:Features.XMLRPC]] remote APIs', 'description' : "Use XWiki's RESTful and XML/RPC remote APIs to easily integrate XWiki with your application."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@preferences-system-windows.png', 'link' : '[[Portlet Integration>>platform:Features.PortletIntegration]]', 'description' : "Add XWiki as a [[Portlet>>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portlet]] in a Portal."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@network-server.png', 'link' : '[[Database Support>>platform:Features.DatabaseSupport]]', 'description' : "Documents are stored in a relational database. Use your favorite database."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@x-office-spreadsheet.png', 'link' : '[[Integrated Statistics>>platform:Features.IntegratedStatistics]]', 'description' : "See who's reading or contributing to your wiki, what are the most viewed documents and more."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@keyboard-shortcuts.png', 'link' : '[[Keyboard Shortcuts>>platform:Features.KeyboardShortcuts]]', 'description' : "Keyboard shortcuts help you save time since you never have to take your hands off the keyboard to use the mouse."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@edit-find-replace.png', 'link' : '[[Document Lifecycle>>platform:Features.DocumentLifecycle]]', 'description' : "Create, Edit, Show, Print, Delete, Copy, Rename and Send By Mail documents."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@mail-attachment.png', 'link' : '[[Attachments>>platform:Features.Attachments]]', 'description' : "Attach as many files as you want to any page. These files can then be referenced and used in page contents."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@system-lock-screen.png', 'link' : '[[Rights Management>>platform:Features.RightsManagement]]', 'description' : "Control who can view, edit or delete documents in a flexible manner. Apply rights to a document, a space or an entire wiki."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@user-groups-management.png', 'link' : '[[Users and Groups Management>>platform:Features.UsersAndGroupsManagement]]', 'description' : "Add, delete and edit the users and groups in your wiki."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@black-rss.png', 'link' : '[[Notifications>>platform:Features.Notifications]]', 'description' : "You can stay up to date with changes made to your wiki using RSS feeds and the Watchlist application."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@preferences-desktop-theme.png', 'link' : '[[Skins>>platform:Features.Skins]]', 'description' : "Completely customize document templates, add menus, modify CSS files. You're in complete control of the look & feel."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@preferences-desktop-locale', 'link' : '[[Internationalization>>platform:Features.I18N]]', 'description' : "Support different translations of your documents and have your users be automatically directed to version in their own language."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@utilities-system-monitor.png', 'link' : '[[Scalability & Performance>>platform:Features.ScalabilityPerformance]]', 'description' : "XWiki supports virtual wikis and allows Farms of wikis to be set up easily."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@document-new.png', 'link' : '[[Document Templates & Forms>>platform:Features.Forms]]', 'description' : "Easily creates forms by simple visual editing, attach these forms to documents and query them."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@folder-remote.png', 'link' : '[[WebDAV>>platform:Features.WebDAV]]', 'description' : "Access all of your wiki's attachments and documents using a [[DAV client>>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebDAV]] (file explorer, etc)."}, {'icon' : 'platform:Features.FeaturesExtract@system-lock-screen.png', 'link' : '[[Authentication>>platform:Features.Authentication]]', 'description' : "Describes the various authentication mechanisms suported by XWiki (Form, Basic, LDAP, Custom, etc)."} ]) ## Allow calling page to add items to the map #if ($extraFeatureMap) #set ($discard = $map.addAll($extraFeatureMap)) #end {{/velocity}}
{{velocity filter="html"}} #foreach ($item in $map) #if ($foreach.count % 2 == 1) $nl #end |(%class='featureIcon'%)[[image:Features.FeaturesExtract@$item['icon']]]|(%class='featureDescription'%)((( $item['link']$nl $item['description'] ))) #end {{/velocity}}
